chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Yeah...every one of my friends that are girls tell me that everyday.

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: Oh...but am I only your friend?

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: So when I say I love you I really do mean it.

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Yeah I know you do mean it...its just that you dont need to tell me that you love me anymore cuz I know youve love me since the day we been together and i love you more each and everyday.

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: So wanna go somewhere tonight for our 7th anniversary?

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: I dont know...maybe movie then dinner?

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Ill pick you up after I get off and get ready ok?

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: Ok. What time do you get off?

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: In 2 hours and then I gotta go home and yeah get ready which takes about 15-20 minutes...

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: hey...I thought you didnt have work today...

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: One of my co-workers called in sick.

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: Oh okay! So ill see you around 7:30 then?

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Ok my manager is like looking at me so yeah.... i gotta go.

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: (2 hours later) Hey! (gives a kiss to her boyfriend)

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: Um...wait...let me get my bag and we can go ok?

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Ok. (They both watched a movie and ate dinner...once they were done eating they head back to the car but before she got into the car...)

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: Okay but only if you promise me that you will hold my hand while we're driving.

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Wait let me walk you to the place!

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Somewhere! (and gives a kiss to her on the lips)

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: Baby!... (The boy walks her to the place.)

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Ok...let me take the blindfold off.

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: Where are we? (He takes it off her and she opens her eyes and sees the view of the city and at that same spot...that's where he first asked her to be his girlfriend....)

chat.name: Girl
chat.message: This is where you first asked me out...

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: What are you doing the rest of your life? (he asked on his knees and after he says that...behind him...in the air it says, 'Will you marry me?' in fireworks

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: I wasnt at work when you called me...I was planning this whole thing!

chat.name: Boy
chat.message: Is that a yes or a no?
